stadium.name: The Stronghold Bailey
stadium.description: The team plays in the central bailey of Stronghold Castle, a massive fortress built on a plateau overlooking the city. The field is packed earth and cobblestone, and the crowd watches from the surrounding stone ramparts.

stats.pregame_ritual: Leading the team in a synchronized chant that slowly gets louder.
Searching for a four-leaf clover near the sidelines.
Reciting a short, epic poem about a past victory.
Sharing a piece of fermented fish with a teammate.
Listening to the wind for a sign of which way the game will turn.
Eating a piece of honeycomb to 'sweeten' their victory.
Collecting a pebble from every field they've ever played on.
Tugging on their left earlobe three times.
Seeing who on the team can belch the loudest.
Tying a red string around their pinky finger.
Sharing a piece of fermented fish with a teammate.

stadium.name: The Serpent's Pass
stadium.location: Zmeigorod, just west of the lumber mill
stadium.description: Has to be periodically rebuilt whenever the old stadium starts sinking into the swamp. Don‚Äôt worry about it.

stats.pregame_ritual: Rubbing a foul-smelling local mushroom on their elbows for flexibility.
Chugging a raw egg, shell and all.
Performing a series of aggressive, theatrical poses.
Polishing their helmet with a live snail for good luck.
Tensing every muscle in their body at once, then releasing.
Performing a series of aggressive, theatrical poses.
Clapping their hands a prime number of times.
Sharing a ceremonial, non-alcoholic grog from a communal cup.
Looking each teammate in the eye and giving a single, firm nod.
Giving the Trollball a heroic backstory before each game.
Painting a single, matching stripe of mud on each player's face.

preGame:
# TUESDAY NIGHT TROLLBALL: SWAMP THINGS VS. CASTLE KINGS üè∞üêç

**Gooooood evening, Osterra!** It is I, Nok the Corrupter, your favorite demon with a microphone, coming to you LIVE from the echoing ramparts of The Stronghold Bailey! We are in Week 4, folks, and the air smells like ozone, stale beer, and impending medical bills! Tonight, we have a clash of styles that would make a fashion designer weep tears of blood! The **Zmeigorod Snessengers**, fresh from the sinking swamps of the Grove, are here to muddy up the pristine cobblestones of the **New Ravenfall Commanders**!

Now, I‚Äôve been watching the warm-ups, and let me tell you, the cultural differences are staggering! The Commanders, backed by the shiny, self-righteous faction of Eponore‚Äîhello, Sir Tanos, hope you‚Äôre not listening!‚Äîare doing exactly what you'd expect. **Jozef Pepe** is currently engaged in a belching contest with his own teammates. A truly noble display from the defenders of the realm! Meanwhile, **Dusa Curson** is crawling around looking for a four-leaf clover. Kid, unless that clover is made of hardened steel, it‚Äôs not going to save you from a mace to the face!

On the other side, we have the Snessengers! These folks are delightfully unhinged. **Delija Dowling** just chugged a raw egg‚Äî**SHELL AND ALL**! I heard the crunch from up here! That is the kind of dedication to internal lacerations that I respect! And **Evalyn Pierrepont** is... polishing their helmet with a live snail? Sure! Why not! Whatever gets you ready to inflict pain!

The cobblestones are hard, the castle shadows are long, and the Healers look nervous! Can the Commanders defend their fortress, or will the Snessengers drag them down into the muck? Grab your drinks, folks, because IT'S TIME FOR TROLLBALL! üëπüî•
postGame:
# POST-GAME REPORT: SNESSENGERS SILENCE THE STRONGHOLD! üêç2Ô∏è‚É£-0Ô∏è‚É£üè∞

**WHAT A BEAUTIFUL DISASTER!** Put a fork in them, folks, the Commanders are DONE! The Zmeigorod Snessengers walked into New Ravenfall, ignored the fancy architecture, and absolutely strangled the home team with a 2-0 shutout! It was ugly, it was brutal, and it was absolutely magnificent!

Let‚Äôs get right to the carnage, shall we? The game started with high tensions and broken bones! **Fleme Alis** of the Commanders decided to set the tone early, tackling **Evalyn Pierrepont** so hard that the poor Snessenger had to be scraped off the cobblestones immediately! A fantastic start for the home team, but oh boy, did they wake up the beast!

The retaliation was swift and merciless! **Dare Wynnie**, clearly not intimidated by the castle walls, laid out **Jozef Pepe** with a tackle that probably rattled the teeth of his ancestors! And before the Commanders could even catch their breath, **Rose Kluge** smashed into **Moir Sass**, sending the poet-warrior straight to the infirmary! No time for rhymes when your ribs are dust, folks!

But the Snessengers weren't just here to fight; they were here to win! Amidst the chaos of interceptions‚Äîwhere **Jessalin Zobias** and **Dare Wynnie** were playing hot potato with the Trollball‚Äîthe play of the game happened. **Avaria Revell**, standing way back in the Away Field, launched a shot that sailed through the air like a darker, angrier bird! **GOAL!** Two points for Zmeigorod! And believe it or not, that was all the scoring we‚Äôd need!

Let‚Äôs talk about the MVP of violence, **Kleinstein MacGregor**! This absolute unit went on a rampage! First, they took out **Croteau Osmo**, snapping that red string of fate right off their finger! Then, just before the half, they plowed through **Jessalin Zobias**, adding another body to the pile! Kleinstein was clapping a prime number of heads together tonight!

Halftime came and went, bodies were patched up, and **Hooge Imtiaz** managed to drag **Moir Sass** back from the brink. A valiant effort by the Healer! But guess what? **Delija Dowling** didn't care! Moments after returning to the field, Moir Sass was tackled and injured **AGAIN**! That is just mean! That is spiteful! I LOVE IT!

The Commanders' offense was tragic to watch. **Dusa Curson** tried to make things happen, taking a shot from the Home Field, but it went wide! **Rhett Gavrilla** tried to run, but got stuffed by the defense repeatedly. It looked like they were running through molasses, or maybe just overwhelmed by the sheer audacity of the Snessengers!

Even with **Arni Griffith** fumbling the ball and **Dare Wynnie** missing a shot in the second half, the Commanders just couldn't capitalize. Their "commands" were falling on deaf ears! Sir Artorias and his glitter-boys over in Eponore are going to have a hard time spinning this one as a victory for the "forces of good."

In the end, the Snessengers proved that you don't need a castle to be royalty; you just need a big weapon and a bad attitude. The Grove takes the win, and the Stronghold falls silent!

This is Nok the Corrupter, signing off! Remember: It‚Äôs not about whether you win or lose, it‚Äôs about how many people you send to the Healer! Goodnight, Osterra! üéôÔ∏èüíÄ
